name: SARSCoV2VaccinesAll
title: SARS CoV 2 Vaccines, All
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values contains terms related to SARS-CoV-2 vaccines.),(Data Element Scope: ),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes all SARS-CoV-2 vaccines.),(Exclusion Criteria: Excludes other coronavirus vaccines.)
